sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya akan memuat foto-foto liburan saya ke dalam album.
english translation: "I will load my vacation photos into the album."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya perlu mencari pengecas untuk HP saya yang mati.
english translation: "I need to find a charger for my dead phone."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pahlawan itu mengayunkan pedangnya dengan lihai.
english translation: "The hero swung his sword skillfully."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bubuk cokelat itu cocok untuk membuat kue.
english translation: "The chocolate powder is perfect for making cakes."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya akan memasukkan foto-foto kenangan ke dalam album ini.
english translation: "I will put the memories' photos into this album."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya perlu membeli sebuah adaptor untuk laptop saya.
english translation: "I need to buy an adapter for my laptop."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tanda-tanda di jalan itu membantu dalam navigasi.
english translation: "The signs on the road assist in navigation."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Roda mobil itu rusak, dan perlu diganti.
english translation: "The car's wheel is broken and needs to be replaced."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong, berikan saya satu pulpen untuk menulis.
english translation: "Please, give me one pen for writing."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Robot-robot tersebut sedang melakukan tugas mereka dengan baik.
english translation: "The robots are performing their tasks well."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sedang menjahit menggunakan benang merah ini.
english translation: "I am sewing using this red thread."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan lupa mematikan lampu setelah selesai menggunakannya.
english translation: "Don't forget to turn off the light after using it."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Cahaya matahari terbit membuat pemandangan indah di pantai.
english translation: "The light of the sunrise creates a beautiful view at the beach."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Television itu harus dipadamkan sebelum tidur.
english translation: "The television should be turned off before sleeping."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Apakah kamu punya korek api? Saya ingin merokok.
english translation: "Do you have a lighter? I want to smoke."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin menunjukkan sesuatu pada peta ini dengan titik merah.
english translation: "I want to indicate something on this map with a red point."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Fungsi ini berperan penting dalam menyelesaikan masalah tersebut.
english translation: "This function plays an important role in solving the problem."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bahan material ini sangat kuat dan tahan lama.
english translation: "This material is very strong and durable."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sedang melakukan pencarian informasi di internet.
english translation: "I am searching for information on the internet."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Teori ini menjelaskan fenomena alam dengan baik.
english translation: "This theory explains natural phenomena well."
